About Me

I am a Back-End Developer with a strong foundation in data management, specializing in C# .Net and Python. I am passionate about discovering new technologies and dedicated to continuous learning.

My experience includes working with cloud services like AWS and Azure, where I have been involved in optimizing and maintaining software systems. I have also gained hands-on experience in creating Logic Apps and CI/CD pipelines to enhance system efficiency.

In addition to my technical skills, I have experience in integrating back-end systems with various technologies, ensuring seamless functionality in projects ranging from traditional software applications to blockchain-based platforms. My ability to adapt to new technologies and collaborate effectively with teams has been a key factor in delivering high-quality products.

Currently, I am pursuing a Technical Degree in Programming, and I continuously supplement my education with self-taught courses to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in the tech industry.

In me, you will find a dedicated developer who is eager to contribute to the success of any project I am a part of.
